Package view_controller

Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • view_controller.HomeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class controls the Customer Form.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Initializes the UI of the Home Page. It sets the tableview for Appointments and Customers. It also provides an additional report section for users to view information on if a contact has an appointment.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url -
        resourceBundle -

      • onExit

        public void onExit​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Exits the program and closes the database connection.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the Exit button is clicked

      • onAddAppt

        public void onAddAppt​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Sets the ENUM Value ADD in the AddOrUpdate class so the Appointment Form loads empty fields for a new appointment object.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the Add button is clicked
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - prevents the app from crashing if the appointment fxml file isn't found.

      • onDeleteAppt

        public void onDeleteAppt​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Deletes the selected appointment object in the Appointment Tableview on the Home Page.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the Delete button is clicked

      • onUpdateAppt

        public void onUpdateAppt​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Grabs the selected Appointment Object and prepares it for the Appointment Form view. Temporary Contact/Customer objects are created based on the IDs via their respective Access classes.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Update button is clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - prevents the app from crashing if incorrect SQL syntax is used.

      • onAddCus

        public void onAddCus​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Sets the ENUM Value ADD in the AddOrUpdate class so the Customer Form loads empty fields for a new customer object.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the Add button is clicked
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - prevents the app from crashing if the appointment fxml file isn't found.

      • onUpdateCus

        public void onUpdateCus​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Grabs the selected Customer Object and prepares it for the Customer Form view. Copy of the selection is sent to the CustomerAccess class so that the information is displayed in the update form. The customer's Division ID is also looked up in the FirstLevelAccess so that it's pre-selected when user loads the Update form.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Update button is clicked.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - prevents the app from crashing if incorrect SQL syntax is used.

      • onDeleteCus

        public void onDeleteCus​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        The selected customer object's ID is compared to the customer ID set in the Appointment Tableview. If the ID isn't found then the customer object is deleted from the list and removed the mySQL database.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the Delete button is clicked.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • onLogOut

        public void onLogOut​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the user back to the Login Page.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the Logout button is clicked
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - prevents the app from closing if the login page fxml isn't found

      • onWeek

        public void onWeek​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Returns the observableList by current week from the AppoinmentAccess class in the Appointment tableview if the Week radio button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - WEEK radio button is clicked.

      • onMonth

        public void onMonth​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Returns the observableList by current Month from the AppoinmentAccess class in the Appointment tableview if the Month radio button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - MONTH radio button is clicked.

      • onAll

        public void onAll​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Returns all objects from the AppoinmentAccess class in the Appointment tableview if the All radio button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - ALL radio button is clicked.

      • onApptRadio

        public void onApptRadio​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Initializes the values of the combo boxes for Appointment Type - Reports. Calls the methods in the AppointmentsAccess class to get the lists for the combo boxes.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Appointment Type radio button is clicked

      • onCustomerRadio

        public void onCustomerRadio​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Initializes the String values of "YES" or "NO" to the combo boxes for Customers Scheduled - Reports. Calls the methods in the AppointmentsAccess class to get the list for the combo boxes.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Customers Scheduled radio button is clicked

      • onContactRadio

        public void onContactRadio​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Initializes the combo box with current Contact objects in the Contact Appointments - Reports. Calls the methods in the ContactAccess class to get the list of contacts for the combo boxes.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Contact Appointments radio button is clicked

      • onGenerate

        public void onGenerate​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Looks in the Reports section for a selected radio button and their respective combo-box selections. If the radio and respective combo-box(s) are selected, it calls methods in the AppointmentAccess class to search for the information and return it as a report.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - the Generate button is clicked
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
